title: Mouse tiny when i tab out
body: Everytime I tab out of league, my mouse gets tiny when i go back into the game. I looked it up and people said it was the resolution but even when i change the resolution the problem still persists. Please help me, its annoying! I have to relog everytime I tab out just to play with a normal sized mouse.

replies.body:
It sounds like your Windows native resolution may be over 1920x1080, as this is a common issue for players running at 4K resolution. If you  *alt+tab* out when playing at 4K, you'll have this issue, so potential workarounds are either to not *alt+tab* or to run your windows and in-game [resolutions at 1920x1080.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if you have any more issues with this.
